game.title: Rescue the Lost Princess
game.objective: Save the princess from the haunted castle
game.description: The King's only daughter, the princess has been captured by the evils that reside in the haunted castle. Rescue her and you shall be greatly rewarded.

task.objective: Defeat the guards at the castle entrance
task.description: Overcome the enchanted castle guards with caution.

task.objective: Find and Unlock the secret passage
task.description: Discover a hidden passage leading to the princess's room and unlock it.
Fetch the princess from her room and escort her back to King Roland safely.
